subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Subpoenas
Citi Field (NYC)
lead_paragraph: Assemblyman Richard L. Brodsky and the New York Yankees are engaged in an acid, bruising court battle over access to a wide array of documents relating to the team’s new stadium.
snippet: Assemblyman Richard L. Brodsky and the New York Yankees are engaged in an acid, bruising court battle over access to a wide array of documents relating to the team’s new stadium.
